ygData.subject: Re: fletching
ygData.msgSnippet: I have friends that have been buying for me. (feel like i m under 21 yrs old now :) ) And as far the fletching skill as it stands: From what i understand you
ygData.messageBody:
I have friends that have been buying for me. (feel like i'm under 21
yrs old now :) )

And as far the fletching skill as it stands:
From what i understand you have to buy them in bundles of 5 and fletch
them in those same bundles.

This is unconfirmed, but, people were noticing a drastic reduction in
skill advancement per arrow fletched. It appears that the skill is only
checked once per bundle of 5 fletched, instead of 5 times (which it
really should be of course)

I think we should be able to do bundles of 5 for when we just want to
make a whole mess of arrows, and not care about the skill advancement.
But when we are trying to advance our skill, we should be able to do
one at a time to get the skill check per arrow as before. Or make it so
there are 5 skill checks per bundle. As it stands though, we are forced
to do bundles of 5 only with only 1 skill check per 5. Not to mention
they raised the prices. Before each of the lamest components were 1Cp
each. A bundle of 5 is now 6CP each. Not real bad, but after making
sveral thousand arrows, it adds up. Dumb.

But i am usually full of really stupid ideas anyway, so what do i know?

Bathory
Minions of Darkness
Cazic-Thule
